channel.title: Looking for ANY source that has mass click disabled on npc or player
channel.description:
Title says all - ~park :D
And by disabling mass clicking - I mean on players, and npcs, so you cant mass. No matter what u do...THX!
Gimmy the link plz

item.source: Looking for ANY source that has mass click disabled on npc or player

item.title: Looking for ANY source that has mass click disabled on npc or player
item.dc:creator: @I_Br3ndan_I I Br3ndan I
item.description:
@I_Br3ndan_I wrote:

I know how to make mass-clicking disabled in Phonescape. For certain things. Like Doors, Dummies etc.

Just search You start hitting the door

You should see this sendMessage("You start hitting the door"); actionTimer = 20; setAnimation(0x326); addSkillXP((150*playerLevel[2]), 2); addSkillXP((300*playerLevel[3]), 3); addSkillXP((150*playerLevel[18]), 18); updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true;

Change the Animation to anything you wan’t. Change the exp gained for each click, to anything you wan’t. Last of all, to disable mass-clicking change the actionTimer to around 40-50. I hope that helped.

Read full topic
